reviews.review_text: I haven't been able to try the product yet, but so far I'm disappointed by the photos and descriptionâ€¦ REFILLABLE means that it should include a container to refill, as shown in the pictures. I read carefully before ordering and made sure there was not a separate container available for purchase from the same seller to include in my order. There was not, so I ordered based on the main photo and item specifications. If it doesn't include a container, change the description and exclude it from the photo. I checked the company's website after delivery and the same product with the same photos states it includes a container. Not sure if I will keep this since I'll need to buy a container of some sort. I can't find this brand specifically for purchase by itself.
